name: Sleeping Bunny
description:
I've always loved the feeling of when you wake up in a cabin on a crispy morning, and the first thing you need do is start to warm the house. This is a goodnight game for my godchild Elena, who loves winter and bunnies. 

This game was made on Global Game Jam 2019

Controls: 

MOVE: Arrow keys 

WASD | PICKUP / DROP / USE ITEMS: Spacebar
